name: CU_E Demo
description:
CU_E

> A short puzzle game, in fact my first finished game ( well, a demo ). 

> CU_E's main mechanic is dashing through blocks. Remember though, you can only dash while moving.  Additionaly dashing at a right time resets most of the dash's cooldown so you can beat the game faster ( pst, thats why there is a timer! ). 

> Oh, almost forgot! To comlete the demo level you need to get 11 Octahedrons ( those red shiny things )

> Anyways enjoy!
